statements: SELECT * FROM ProductionLineData
SELECT product_name, efficiency_score FROM ProductionLineData WHERE production_date='2022-01-10'
SELECT production_id, product_name FROM ProductionLineData ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT * FROM ProductionLineData WHERE efficiency_score > 0.7
SELECT production_id, production_date, production_time FROM ProductionLineData ORDER BY production_date, production_time
SELECT * FROM ProductionLineData WHERE product_name = 'Product A' ORDER BY production_date DESC, production_time ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT production_id, product_name, efficiency_score FROM ProductionLineData WHERE production_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY efficiency_score DESC
SELECT production_id, product_name, production_date FROM ProductionLineData WHERE efficiency_score > 85 AND product_name LIKE '%Product%'
SELECT AVG(efficiency_score) AS avg_efficiency, MIN(production_time) AS min_time FROM ProductionLineData GROUP BY product_name
SELECT * FROM ProductionLineData WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY production_id ASC
SELECT id, product_name, production_date, production_quantity FROM production_line_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM production_line_data WHERE product_name = 'Product A';
SELECT id, product_name, production_quantity FROM production_line_data WHERE production_quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM efficiency_analysis WHERE process_step LIKE '%assembly%';
SELECT analysis_id, process_step, completion_time FROM efficiency_analysis ORDER BY completion_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM production_line_data WHERE production_quantity > 100 ORDER BY production_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, production_quantity FROM production_line_data WHERE production_quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT AVG(production_quantity) AS avg_quantity, MAX(production_quantity) AS max_quantity FROM production_line_data WHERE product_name='Product A'
SELECT analysis_id, process_step, efficiency_score FROM efficiency_analysis WHERE efficiency_score > 0.8 ORDER BY completion_time DESC
SELECT product_name, production_date, production_quantity FROM production_line_data WHERE production_quantity < 50 AND production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM production_line_data ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, efficiency FROM production_line_data WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM machine_data ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT machine_name, status FROM machine_data WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_data WHERE role = 'manager';
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, production_date, efficiency FROM production_line_data;
SELECT * FROM machine_data WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_data ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM production_line_data WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY production_date ASC;
SELECT employee_name, role FROM employee_data WHERE department = 'Engineering' AND role = 'Engineer';
SELECT * FROM production_line_data;
SELECT product_id, timestamp FROM production_line_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, product_id, efficiency FROM production_line_data WHERE efficiency > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM product_details WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_data ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM production_line_data WHERE efficiency > 0.8 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM production_line_data GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_products DESC;
SELECT pd.product_name, pd.category, ps.total_products FROM product_details pd JOIN production_stats ps ON pd.product_id = ps.id WHERE ps.production_date = '2022-03-15';

SELECT ed.employee_name, ed.department, COUNT(pl.id) AS total_records FROM employee_data ed LEFT JOIN production_line_data pl ON ed.employee_id = pl.product_id GROUP BY ed.employee_name, ed.department;

SELECT DISTINCT pd.category, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM product_details pd JOIN production_line_data pl ON pd.product_id = pl.product_id GROUP BY pd.category HAVING total_products > 100 ORDER BY total_products DESC;
SELECT * FROM production_line_data;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM production_line_data WHERE is_defective = TRUE;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_data ORDER BY department, employee_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM machine_data WHERE is_active = TRUE ORDER BY machine_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, production_date, quantity, is_defective FROM production_line_data WHERE quantity > 100 AND is_defective = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM production_line_data ORDER BY production_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM production_line_data WHERE is_defective = true AND quantity > 50;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_data WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT log_id, log_description, log_timestamp, employee_name FROM production_logs JOIN employee_data ON production_logs.employee_id = employee_data.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM machine_data WHERE is_active = true AND machine_type = 'CNC';
